name: 4 Corners (portable_bird)
description:
It's Groundhog Day in an asteroid field, and its your job to collect cargo from all 4 corners. 

With each failure there will be fewer asteroids, and you will understand the patterns of the remaining asteroids a bit better. 

Go for speed or for the most asteroids remaining on 9 levels of increasing difficulty.

Controls:

Left/RightTurnUpThrustXStart/ContinueCCycle through levels (level changes on restart)Hold Down + Press XForce restart level from beginning

Game made with Pico-8 for the Wowie Jam 3.0
